dc:title:
From Union Square to Rome,
Chapter 5 - Rayna Prohme
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of the deep friendship with Rayna Prohme whose joyousness and love for truth deeply impressed her. Although Rayna died a Communist, she is counted among those who belong "to the invisible unity of the Church."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 205 1938-01-07 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
